metadata.title: CVE-2024-53170 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:block: fix uaf for flush rq while iterating tagsblk_mq_clear_flush_rq_mapping() is not called during scsi probe, bychecking blk_queue_init_done(). However, QUEUE_FLAG_INIT_DONE is clearedin del_gendisk by commit aec89dc5d421 ("block: keep q_usage_counter inatomic mode after del_gendisk"), hence for disk like scsi, followingblk_mq_destroy_queue() will not clear flush rq from tags->rqs[] as well,cause following uaf that is found by our syzkaller for v6.6:==================================================================BUG: KASAN:
